title: Samsung security breach sees Galaxy source code stolen by hacker group, no personal data
content:
Samsung this morning confirmed a hacker group has successfully breached the company’s servers, but your personal data apparently is not at risk.

more…

The post Samsung security breach sees Galaxy source code stolen by hacker group, no personal data appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Samsung has confirmed that a hacker group has breached security, stealing source code data for Galaxy devices but not personal data.
